name: @codeplaydata/datasus

scripts.build: tsc && copy LICENSE dist\LICENSE && copy README.md dist\README.md && copy package.json dist\package.json
scripts.build:lib: tsc -p tsconfig.lib.json && copy LICENSE dist\LICENSE && copy README.md dist\README.md && copy package.json dist\package.json

author: Pedro Paulo dos Santos (dr2p) - https://github.com/dr2pedro
description: This application decompress the datasus micro data and serve as a gateway class.
